snippet.textDisplay:
Today on Facebook
Public Statement from Amber Heard her own self. That Amber Heard is still Mera in Aquaman 2 the lost kingdom.
And Amber Heard also said that Johnny Depp campaign didn't even made anything on All Social Media.
I have been waiting from both sides for their Public Statement from them.
Yet there haven't been any Public Statement from Johnny Depp on any Social Media at all, cause Johnny Depp went quite.
Amber Heard did came forward the Honest Truth on the Aquaman 2 and she is right on the movie.

snippet.textDisplay: I know for a fact if he was slapped her around she would have called the police and had throwing jail and that's not what happened she waited until after the divorce was final to go to the UK and then file suit that claims he was slapped around so she could get a judgment in the UK because she didn't have enough evidence to get one in a civil trial in the US so she did this backdoor trial crap And the fact that he's filed suit here in the USI think in the end he's gonna win and if that's the case Disney is gonna owe him a ton of money because apparently they don't want him To do anything for them and he was under contract so I think in the end he'll probably win out because because I think she lied through her teeth
snippet.textOriginal: I know for a fact if he was slapped her around she would have called the police and had throwing jail and that's not what happened she waited until after the divorce was final to go to the UK and then file suit that claims he was slapped around so she could get a judgment in the UK because she didn't have enough evidence to get one in a civil trial in the US so she did this backdoor trial crap And the fact that he's filed suit here in the USI think in the end he's gonna win and if that's the case Disney is gonna owe him a ton of money because apparently they don't want him To do anything for them and he was under contract so I think in the end he'll probably win out because because I think she lied through her teeth

snippet.textDisplay: The Me Too Scenario.  But … clearly here, Depp is the victim.  Testimony on the parts of colleagues.  Former girlfriends.  Recorded audio.  Her past violence.  So, Me Too people, recognize that the flip side of the coin is a consideration.  Why should Depp lose major acting roles while she is moving forward with hers despite the fact that the evidence is clearly against her? So, girlfriends, be fair.
snippet.textOriginal: The Me Too Scenario.  But … clearly here, Depp is the victim.  Testimony on the parts of colleagues.  Former girlfriends.  Recorded audio.  Her past violence.
